postDetails.title: Canon Fodder: High-Value Histories
postDetails.description: In this month's Canon Fodder, we take a look back across the Halo games to explore the stories behind some of the high-value targets you've faced over the years – from legendary Kig-Yar snipers to deadly Jiralhanae warlords, and beyond...

activityItems.description: took a screenshot in Halo Infinite
activityItems.ugcCaption: Humans don't like methane. Even the Demons don't like it! Maybe they just gotta play with it some more, then they'll be seein' what this spicy lung gold is all about... so here's the deal: you do a finish of all your Yappening stuffs and you can have some of mine!

postDetails.title: Halo: MCC – August Update Is Live
postDetails.description: The August Update for MCC is now live! Jump in to learn about all the improvements and additional features coming, including new armor sets, new Forge capabilities, UI enhancements, campaign collectibles, post-match poses, and more!
